issue.description: Word document: Use of “i.e.” is deprecated – see SD. Suggest replacement with one of the alternative formulations suggested in the SD.
Word document: Comments to reader do not include any reference to motivation for extension to Part 4. Suggest that we include sentence on motivation for extension to part 41 in comments to reader.
Word document: Key words do not include any of new concepts introduced into Part 41. Suggest that we extend key words to include some of new concepts introduced into Part 41.
Word document: Inconsistent spacing after commas, full-stops and colons. Should always use single spacing after commas, full-stops and colons (except in EXPRESS code).

Word document: Widows, orphans, and headings with no accompanying text on same page should be avoided – see SD. Suggest removal of any widows, orphans, and headings with no accompanying text on same page from new version of Part 41.

Word document: Cross references to annexes should refer to (say) “annex A” where the word “annex” is in lower case and the letter in question is in upper case. Amend (as necessary) all cross-references to annexes so that they are consistent and are in line with the SD.
Word document: Year should be “2003” throughout the document. Amend (as necessary) all years in all headers and footers.
Word document: Second instance of "QUALIFICATION" in the table of short names should be "QUALIFICATION_RELATIONSHIP".
Word document: Short name for "EXPERIENCE_TYPE_ROLE" in the table of short names should be "EXTYRL".
Word document: "POSITION_IN_ORGANIZATION_TYPE_RELATIONSHIP" in the table of short names should be "POSITION_IN_ORGANIZATION_TYPE_ASSIGNMENT".
Word document: "POSITION IN ORGANIZATION" in the table of short names should be "POSITION_IN_ORGANIZATION" - occurs in several entries.

comment.description: we should use the N525 EXPRESS

issue.description: Word document: "10303-41:1994" at start of list of post edition 2 changes should be "10303-41:2000"
Word document: organization_assignment, organization_role, and organization should be removed from list of entities added since edition 2
Word document: location_representation_assignment and location_representation_role should be added to list of entities added since edition 2
Word document: Shortname clash: EXPERIENCE_TYPE_RELATIONSHIP EXTYRL and EXPERIENCE_TYPE_ROLE EXTYRL Change shortname for EXPERIENCE_TYPE_RELATIONSHIP to EXTYREL
Word document: Changes from edition 1 to edition 2 should be included along with changes between edition 2 and edition 3.
Word document and XML: All role attributes should be mandatory
Word document and XML: All role attributes should be mandatory
Word document and XML: All xxx_relationship entities should have matching acyclic_xxx_relationship functions.
Word document: EXPRESS source should have colons lined up vertically.
Word document: Scope page banner has "FDIS" instead of "CD". One of the sections has "FDIS" in the header instead of "CD".

Descriptions about modifications do not coincide with the content of the document. Example 1) 1.1) current description of Introduction The EXPRESS-G diagram Figure D.45 has been modified so that the entity previously named “action_role” is now named "action_method_role" in accordance with the EXPRESS. 1.2) comment Figure D.45 does not exist in ed2 document, and entity "action_method_role" is not found in Figure D.45 of ed3 document. Example 2) Added entity in Figure D.32, “person_type_definition_relationship”, is not described in Introduction. Example 3) Added entity in Figure D.53, “qualification_relationship”, is not described in Introduction.

comment.description: The entries at "1.1" and "1.2" have been deleted. The diagram in question was from an earlier version of part 41 ed2 not from the published version. The other entries in this section have been checked and are correct. The missing entities have been added to the list.

issue.description: Experience, position and qualification, those are described as added declarations in Introduction, are missing in this subclause.

comment.description: The entries at "1.1" and "1.2" have been deleted. The diagram in question was from an earlier version of part 41 ed2 not from the published version. The other entries in this section have been checked and are correct. The missing entities have been added to the list.

issue.description: “A person_type is a kind of person” is an inadequate definition.

comment.description: The text "A person_type is a category of people having common characteristics." has been substituted.

issue.description: Location includes in its semantics address. It was agreed at the WG12 meeting in Stuttgart to add a note at location that the concept of address is a specific kind of location and that this can be found elsewhere in the document.

comment.description: At 25.3.1, the text: "NOTE The specification or representation of a location might take the form of a postal address, a set of geographical or spatial coordinates, or an association with a product." has been added and the Word document has thus been aligned with the XML version of this part.

issue.description: The following text includes a spelling error: " EXAMPLE The association of a location with its representation as as set of geographical co-ordinates."

comment.description: At 8.4.35, the text "EXAMPLE The association of a location with its representation as as set of geographical co-ordinates." has been corrected to "EXAMPLE The association of a location with its representation as a set of geographical co-ordinates."
